metadata.title: CVE-2018-5122 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
A potential integer overflow in the "DoCrypt" function of WebCrypto wasidentified. If a means was found of exploiting it, it could result in anout-of-bounds write. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 58.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5122` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-globalmenu - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-mozsymbols - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-testsuite - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1').
